MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Doddington, Newport Road and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9.52AM. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate the power loss and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1PM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.52AM on 31st January 2021.
